name: Walking on thin ice
description:
Walking on thin ice, is a simple puzzle game made for the ludum dare game jam.

Your goal is to reach your igloo.  While trying to avoid or push away the oil-extracting robots that are melting the ice. The game was made by greenphox, nananeos and felix4rt .

RULES!!!!!

You move with the arrow keys.

You can push robots.

Robots melt the ice that surrounds them (and diagonnaly).

When you push a robot on to the sea or in the end of the level they are getting destroyed.

Press "R" to restart.  Enjoy!
